title: Diamond as Big as the Ritz - allusion to Hades

content.prompt: Which of the following best describes the overall function of the passage’s allusion to “Hades”?

choices.label: The narrator exploits a common understanding of the reference for comic effect.
The narrator aims to subvert certain popular misconceptions about a term’s meaning.
The narrator uses the term to hint at a more ominous interpretation of seemingly benign events.
The narrator casually mentions the term to suggest characters’ misunderstanding of the reference.

skill.text: Skill 6.D: Identify and explain the function of an allusion.
